content.text: Not much, just driving to work. I'm a wedding planner.
Wow, that's a cool job! I like planning things. Do you enjoy it?
It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding. I love making people happy.
I bet! I love making music, it's super therapeutic.
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar, and I'm really good at it. I love playing blues and country music.
That's awesome! I don't have any musical talent, so I'm really impressed.
Thanks! I've been playing for about 15 years, so I've had a lot of practice.
That's a long time! Do you have a band?
I used to, but we broke up a few years ago. I'm still trying to find some new band members.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sure you'll find some soon.
Well, I'm about to get to work. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
